Joe Anderson, CFP, and Big Al Clopine, CPA give you the steps to success to grow your wealth at any age!

programme.title: WTF Do Think Tanks Actually Do
programme.desc: Politicians create laws in so many diverse fields that its literally impossible for them to actually understand most of it. When the men and women who decide how the country is being run rely on unelected experts getting huge salaries from

programme.title: "Business ""Ethics"""
programme.desc: "It’s understandable that investors would like their money going towards companies that are (at the very least) TRYING to do the right thing, but unfortunately not many people really understand how these investments work, or how they could actually be making these problems a lot worse. So it’s time to learn How Money Works to find out why corporate ethics, is the second worst idea in business history."

programme.title: "Future Energy, Saving Balance, and Scheduling Tips"
programme.desc: Financial advisor Ric Edelman looks at investing today into tomorrows energy resources; advises on how to save for tomorrow while living in the present; and Jean Edelman provides tips on balancing your schedule.

programme.title: "Retirement for a Dream Home, Moore's Law, and the Power of Words"
programme.desc: Investment advisor Ric Edelman answers the question if its a good idea to dip into your retirement nest egg to buy your dream home; interviews Rob Nail about how Moores Law will impact humanitys future; and Jean Edelman explores the power of words.

programme.title: "When to Pay Off Your Home, Retire, and Do Roth Conversions"
programme.desc: "Deciding whether to be debt-free, controlling your taxes, and choosing when to retire are all part of the retirement plan spitballing, today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast."

programme.title: Navigating Retirement Solo
programme.desc: Are you navigating your financial future solo? When youre single, lifes twists and turns can be more devastating than if you are building your wealth with a partner. Taking the helm solo requires special tools and strategies to help ensure youll reach your financial goals. Joe Anderson, CFP, and Big Al Clopine, CPA, help to guide you through rough waters to safe harbor.

programme.title: Fraud Has Cost You Your Financial Future
programme.desc: "Fraud cost Americans a total of 5.8 BILLION dollars in 2021, and most trackers suggest that number will be even greater this year. These stories can be easy to ignore because the victims of these crimes often had to, frankly, be pretty stupid and financially illiterate to get caught up in them. Anybody who has been anywhere near the internet in the last 20 years should know by now you dont send money to Nigerian princes with yahoo email accounts or corporate executives playing league of legends during an investor meeting. Its all pretty common-sense stuff, and you might then incorrectly assume that the rise in fraud is of no concern to you. When you really think about it that 5.8 Billion dollar figure sounds bad, until you work out that thats only $17.50 per American for an entire year, not to flex too hard but I have spent more on a Starbucks coffee before. Its hard to see how such a small cost could be doing something as severe as costing young Americans their financial futures, but it is. So its time to learn How Money Works, to find out why you really need to start taking stories about fraud personally, even if you never think that you would be dumb enough to fall for these schemes yourself. "

programme.title: LinkedIn is Ruining your Career & Do Woke Companies Go Broke
programme.desc: LinkedIn is one of the strangest social media platforms in existence. Where else can you find people bragging about working unpaid overtime and writing appreciation posts to the companies that just laid them off? It’s a really weird website… But is it hurting your career? LinkedIn is a strange place where people talk at length about how great they are at their job to look enticing to potential future employers. In 2006 when the company was founded it was a strange concept, but it has worked for LinkedIn which is now the ninth largest social media platform in the world. It had more monthly users than twitter before both sites were acquired. Elon Musk and a team of investors purchased twitter for forty four BILLION dollars in October twenty-twenty-two, a record sum for a social media company being taken private. Musk’s controversial purchase beat LinkedIn’s record from 2016 when it was taken private by Microsoft from twenty-six point two billion dollars. Musk is often criticized for overpaying for twitter when LinkedIn is the comparison. At the time of acquisition LinkedIn had slightly more monthly users than Twitter but it also had something that the blue bird just couldn’t match. Every time you log into LinkedIn you are giving Microsoft something unmatched by every other social network in existence, value. If you are using a service for free YOU are the product and LinkedIn users are the most valuable product of them all. LinkedIn generated revenues of thirteen point eight billion dollars in 2022 which is two and a half times higher than twitters highest year of revenue ever. We don’t have public figures on it now since it is a private company but most analyst expect that twitters revenues are down since Musk’s acquisition. The average LinkedIn user is worth seventy six times more than the average reddit user, thirty five times more than the average Pinterest user, four times as much as the average YouTube viewer and three times as much as the average Facebook user. Additionally, a site like YouTube is much more

Clipper: The Race Of Their Lives (Ep1)
Clipper: The Race Of Their Lives (Ep1)
House Of The Gods
programme.desc: The great northern prow of Mount Roraima soars from the depths of the Amazon rainforest like the prow of a gigantic ship. Shrouded in cloud, drenched by torrential rain and guarded by vertical jungle, deep mud and overhanging cliffs, local legend has it that only those of pure soul will ever see the summit of Mount Roraima.

programme.title: Pathfinder
programme.desc: Life Beyond Fear. Pathfinder is a tale about the human spirit.The film follows six world-class slackliners (Highliners) on a mission deep into the Norwegian mountains to attempt something that’s never been seen before: Walking a thin line, elevated in the vastness between two colossal cliffs, illuminated only by the mystical northern lights.

programme.title: On the Verge
programme.desc: In the mountains behind the sleepy coastal town of Powell River, BC, a small group of rock climbers has spent decades quietly pioneering routes on some of the largest granite walls in Canada. As the last stands of old-growth trees harboured in these valleys come under threat of logging, the climbing community faces the uncertain future of a place that has come to define their lives and legacies.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking Lake Mazinaw
programme.desc: Bon Echo is a small and extremely beautiful Provincial Park in Ontario's Highlands, which draws in visitors from all over thanks to the world class canoe tripping and kayak touring that it offers. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he takes in the dramatic cliff faces on Lake Mazinaw, which bear hundreds of Indigenous pictographs, from the seat of his sea kayak.

programme.title: The Mega-Gap
programme.desc: Join Teton Gravity Research and Anthill Films as they build a 70-foot gap for Tom Van Steebergen to go as big as he has ever gone on his mountain bike while filming for unReal, TGR's 2015 bike film.

programme.title: The Himalayas
programme.desc: Join Jeremy Jones and the Teton Gravity Research team as they set out on their last and most difficult expedition: Trekking high into the Himalayan Mountains of Nepal for Higher, TGR's 2014 snowboard film.

programme.title: P3: Pedal Powder Paddle
programme.desc: Three friends from Canmore Alberta set out to paddle board the headwaters of one of Canada’s longest rivers, the north Saskatchewan. To get there they will have to bike, hike, ski and snowboard their way across two glaciers and one 11,000’ mountain ….all in one epic day.

programme.title: The Mentor
programme.desc: Professional climber Marcus Garcia travels from his home in southwest Colorado’s San Juan Mountains to the limestone cliffs and spires of El Potrero Chico in northern Mexico to revisit his mentor’s final climb. In an emotional and powerful act of closure, he reflects on the accident that took him a decade to talk about—and climbs the route that took his mentor’s life.

programme.title: Resilient
programme.desc: Life flourishes when you can learn to push down barriers and challenges that can be thrown at you out of nowhere. Jerad Fischer, Lindsey Runkel, and Dan Soller are the living proof of how you can keep shredding and attacking life with a positive and tenacious attitude after a life-changing injury. From Colorado local dirt jumps, to Highland Mountain, to the Adaptive MTB World Champs, “Resilient” will prove that we are all capable of what we put our minds to! Finalist – VIMFF 2020.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: WEMTB
programme.desc: WEMTB is a 30 minutes Mountain Bike project filmed in Spain and 2 islands, Tenerife and Ibiza, with top Spanish riders such as Toni Ferreiro, Bernat Guardia, Edgar Carballo, Gabriel Torralba, Iago Garay and many more. Including sisters, brothers, father and son, a wolf dog and Pablo Alonso pedalling against Parkinson´s disease. Nature, family, self improvement and beautiful trails. Filmed and produced by Dirtyflows in 2018 and 2019.

programme.title: FIA GT Sprint
programme.desc: A short, intense race featuring GT3 cars, with a single driver per car.

programme.title: Gurney Cup
programme.desc: A 45-minute, two-driver race for sports-racing prototypes from 1963 to 1966. Iconic cars such as the Ford GT40, Lotus 23B, and Chevron B6 competed in this high-speed event.

programme.title: Michelin 12H Misano
programme.desc: Endurance racing heads to Italy as the 24H Series takes on the iconic Misano World Circuit. GTs and touring cars battle through the night in this demanding 12-hour showdown under the lights of the Adriatic coast.

programme.title: The Lifted Life
programme.desc: At the Denver Sportsmens Expo a customized 2018 F-350 is revealed to local construction contractor Rick Low.

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Chris takes the Triumph Tiger 900 Rally Pro to some of his favourite roads and trials to find out if their claim is true.

programme.title: SKIN BUSINESS
programme.desc: THE SKIN BUSINESS is a movie about how the Internet has cut into the profits of what was once thought to be a recession-proof business, and how directors and producers are gambling on a newly- popular genre of porn: the porn parody. This film shows how the industry takes on some of entertainments most popular franchises and makes them xxx; from Batman, to the Addams Family, to the Brady Bunch and even animated features like American Dad, there is nothing in mainstream that cant be made fun of in porn. If you love porn, you will love this movie. If you are a virgin to the world of porn, consider this Porn 101.

programme.title: CAUGHT IN THE GAME
programme.desc: Lisa James a beautiful real estate broker get Caught up in a vicious love Triangle. As the crooked scheme she runs with her drug dealing boyfriend Todd Scott get out of hand when she falls in love with the romantic new janitor Joshua. Her new loves bring envy between her and her friends Angie and Eve, and also with Todds right hand man Craze. With Lisa blinded by love she losses control with her scheme and she cant see who coming to stab her in the back as she gets Caught in the Game

programme.title: RANDOM 11
programme.desc: Prodigy detective Mitsuko Unagi is on the hunt for a notorious serial killer known only as Eleven. It started 10 years earlier, on February 29th 2006, when a series of murders began, involving 11 randomly selected victims killed simultaneously in various parts of Tokyo. The killings continue over the next decade, leaving the police with no evidence, no witnesses, and the killer always one step ahead. But now something is different, and the killer has changed his pattern, giving Detective Unagi the one chance to finally get closer to solving the mystery of the Random 11

programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. programme.title: Legends of Racing: A.J. Foyt
programme.desc:
The story of Foyt takes us on a journey from his humble beginnings on the dusty fairgrounds tracks of his native Texas all the way to the greatest achievements in auto racing history around the globe at Indianapolis, Daytona and Le Mans.
From reaching unprecedented heights in his racing career to the depths of despair in the hospital rooms just waiting to make his triumphant return, the life and times of SuperTex are chronicled.

programme.title: Tiggys Big Feast
programme.desc: Tiggy is all flustered and confused as he’s not prepared, nor has any idea what to make for a surprise lunch he promised Mayor De Pfeffel. Seems Deedee’s magic is the only answer. The spell she conjures makes Tiggy be totally decided on the recipe that he sees first. And when the spell is cast, the recipe book opens up exactly at the recipe of a pie made of Tika Pila flowers. The problem is that only the Doobydoos can pick the Tika Pila flowers as it grows in the most prickly cacti in Abra-Dabra! But no matter how much Deedee and Nino coax Tiggy to work on another recipe; Tiggy is totally fixated on the Tika Pila flower pie. Though the Doobydoos love eating the flowers, they are too scared of the loud and angry Tika Pila monster that guards them and rush off in a hurry. They finally hit a bargain with Tiggy in exchange for a hundred custard sandwiches. Only with much reassuring and coaxing they pick every Tika Pila flower around. Mayor De Pfeffel is already at Tiggy’s and really hungry. But one Doobydoo is too ambitious and stays back to pick the last Tika Pila flower, but that awakes the Tika Pila monster and he shouts the biggest shout ever, scaring Tiggy and making the pie fly up high and splatter down on his face! The inevitable terrible has happened and there is nothing to give the Mayor. Just then when things couldn’t get any worse Mayor De Pfeffel lunges inside and is happy to see a whole plate of his favourite custard sandwiches.

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: TEA-PORIS
programme.desc: A gang of biker taporis come to hotel Kelifornia one day. They are such menacing baddies that they play all sorts of funny pranks with Sundar. Sundar being the sincere waiter takes it all until he is so sad that Sundar goes behind the hotel all sad and disappointed. Though Basha loves messing with Sundar, he cant take the bikers messing with Sundar. And our super smart Basha decides to give the bikers a heavier dose of their own medicine. What we see then is Basha in full Ranjikant style and adas punishing the rouge bikers in the most hilarious ways. And an excited Sundar doesnt forget to reward Basha generously with his favourite snacks. And in no time the tapori bikers flee for their dear lives.

programme.title: Python Problem
programme.desc: Don is trimming the hedge and humming to himself and guess what slithers out from between the bush. A python. And this is no ordinary python, he can beat up Colonel, drive a truck with its tail, stay alive in the fridge and lots more.

programme.title: Tarantula Twist
programme.desc: A wealthy eccentric bureaucrat from South America is saunters into the tea shop one day. Chai Raja is eager to please the bureaucrat and cordons off a VIP section for him- however such demarcations are of no consequence when Basha and Sundar are locked in a manic chase. The naughty Basha manoeuvres Sundar into crashing past the barricade and upsetting the careful setup. The blustering bureaucrat is all set to throw a fit when suddenly he sees something and shrieks in childlike delight. Its a massive spider that often lurks about the tea-shop. Fishing out a delicate collectors glass case with exotic arachnids, the foreigner eagerly points at the one missing species that he has not yet managed to bag. He wants the spider Pronto! Chai Raja orders Sundar to nab said arachnid but Sundar is frankly freaked out. He gingerly sets about his task as the bureaucrat taps manicured fingers in impatience but finds its not going to be easy as Basha just to spite Sundar has decided to team up with the Tarantula and preserve the latters freedom. The tarantula in its turn, is no pushover and proves deft and spinning inventive webs that not only trap people but bounce them off or string them up etc. The many booby traps Sundar lays all backfire and finally end in bureaucrats glass case rupturing and the collected chasing the collector. While Sundar gets his spatula dues from Chai Raja. Basha and the Tarantula hi-five- one against seven

programme.title: SWOOPER SUNDAR
programme.desc: Chai Raja goes away on vacation and Sundar is super proud to be left in charge- Sundar slips into the sous-chef role and manages to keep the customers happy despite Bashas meddling. After a particularly hectic service, Sundar believes he has earned the right to kick back and opens his own little easy chair (modeled after Chai Rajas) to bask when he spots a beautiful poodle. Boing! Sundars heart goes a-thump and he leaps up all ready to impress the poodle. He bounds over and invites her in all Casanova style the hotel is his after all for the day- or almost. The poodle is intrigued and agrees but no sooner they take two steps that a street smart handsome hound shows up and decides that the poodle should be his arm candy. Sundar, annoyed tries to impress the poodle with his hotelier skills but the hound manages to downplay or disrupt Sundars serenading by showing off his own street smarts. Basha sees this as a perfect opportunity to lay hands on some fritters and impishly adds to Sundars woes by pranking him. Sundar must now handle both Basha and the hound as he tries to impress his lady love but the tension literally hits the roof and sends everything crashing just as Chai Raja cycles back in. The poodle gives Sundar the cold shoulder and Chai Raja a broom to clean up the mess!

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: Froggy Friends
programme.desc: The frogs from the well are good friends of Keet so when ever Cat tries to enter the house to steal something from the kitchen they will croak and Keet.

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Slimey Smlugs
programme.desc: Sneevils newest pet Smlugs are destroying all of the plumbing in Smightyland. The Super Six must smlug drive them out before its too late.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: Kramazon
programme.desc: Buzz watches Miss Paige order supplies before her vacation online and have it show up the next day. Buzz tells the others and the Creepy Candy hatch a plan to go shopping while Paige is away! Watch the chaos unfold in this hilarious episode when their order is delivered and the party begins!

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: Too Cute
programme.desc: Biggs transforms himself into a cute baby animal to blend into Leilas Zoo. Now disguised, he can easily help Sneevil steal the Earth Stone. But all the sweet attention from Leila makes Biggs question his loyalty.

programme.title: HYPNO-TACO
programme.desc: A new taco stand that has abruptly popped up overnight next to the tea shop. Strangely, though the tacos smell anything but tasty, the customers flock to it and Chai Raja sends Sundar to deal with matters. But that compounds the disaster as Sundar too turns his back at Chai Raja and starts guarding/waiting at the Taco stand with double his usual smartness! Though this gives Basha full freedom to raid the banana fries at the tea shop, Chai Rajas long face tugs at this heartstrings and Basha nips over to the taco stand to take a look at things. Thats when he realizes that the taco stand owner is in fact a rogue hypnotist from Bashas old circus who is literally hypnotizing the customers and Sundar to munch his Mexican lunch! Cracking his knuckles in glee, Basha sets about driving the rogue out of his mind and business. But a hypnotized Sunder is more powerful than ever, and Basha get whacked here and there in the ordeal. At last Basha gives a nice knock on Sundars head and he is back at the tea shop and Basha and Sundar together makes sure that the taco shop-owner runs for his dear life, much to Chai Rajas relief.

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: HOT(H)ELL
programme.desc: Chai Raja has a wedding to attend and leaves the hotels charge in Sundars hands for the first time ever. Sundar wants to prove to his boss that he is truly capable. He is all geared up and tries everything possible to make tea in his boss style. It is tea rain all over the place with the customers cringing and getting burned. It is havoc in the teashop when Basha decides to add to Sundars agony. What follows is a mad chase. And when Chai Raja returns, what remains of his beloved eashop is just the door!!!

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: I Lee
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Universal Remote
programme.desc: A mishap with electricity converts Colonel into a remote controlled dog. And Charly, Marly and Larry exploit the situation to the maximum, making poor Colonel their remote controlled puppet. But nothing is forever, now it is time the trio came into Colonel’s shoes bu ha ha ha…

programme.title: MeetZoonicornValeo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: CHOR POLICE
programme.desc: One fine morning, an evidently pea-brained police constable comes to hotel Kelifornia with a smart thief handcuffed to his hand. Basha is absolutely enjoying the funny difficulties the policeman faces while having food with the thief handcuffed to his hand; while Sundar is all respect for the policemen. Basha decides to up the fun by making the policemens life miserable; and Sundar is in running around protecting the policemen. But he causes more trouble than help. The mayhem reaches a crescendo when the smart thief gets to runs away when the handcuff breaks in the madness and in his place Sundar gets handcuffed to the policeman. And a fuming policeman whacks Sundar and runs behind the thief!Basha laughs innocently basking in his successful mischief!

programme.title: ZoonicornsIntheZooniverse
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: A Fright Night
programme.desc: It is late night movie day and Don and Colonel are watching Dracula. Don is shell scared and the rat trio has a superb idea. Now with Charly, Marly and Larry trying all sorts of pranks, it is utter fright night for Don and Colonel. But even the rats come to fear Dracula… How???

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: Knight Racer
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: The dirtiest dinosaur
programme.desc: The twins learn the benefits of cleanliness when they encounter an ailing dinosaur.

programme.title: Scared
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala watch a scary late-show on TV – and all wind up too scared to go to bed, their imaginations soon running wild...

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: The Gigantic Turnip
programme.desc: A gigantic turnip grows in the fields of the peasant GoGo grandpa. He tries to pull out an enormous, heavy turnip with the help of grandma, cats, and mice.

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: Chill out!
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in the gaming world where an irascible frog is very angry: no wonder nobody ever wants to play with him, unless...

programme.title: Crazy Cricket
programme.desc: Bee stings, explosions, and with frogs croaking around, this is no ordinary game of cricket. So will Don hit a six or would it be Marly?

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and “trouble”.

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: King couch potato
programme.desc: The twins travel to a medieval castle where they meet a king who is too comfortable and lazy to ever leave home.

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: Ghost Mansion
programme.desc: Keet and Cat’s chase ends up in a haunted house…with a crazy ghost living in it. The ghost loves Keet and wants to have her as a pet for himself.

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and “trouble”.

programme.title: The Heroes’ Path
programme.desc: Xia is bored because it’s been days since Negu sent a Mutant when he finds the instructions for the “Heroes’ Path”. Pai and April laugh at what they think is a silly game for kids, but Xia completes each step with great excitement. When one of the instructions is to steal the Glove of the North, Xia begins to suspect something. Thanks to his quick wits he manages to save the Glove of the North and find out who was behind the “Heroes’ Path” – a mutant fox, sent by Negu.

programme.title: A Fog of A Different Color
programme.desc: When the Foggy messes with the Zoonicorns colors, Maple learns that the appearance of a thing does not define what it is. It’s not what’s on the outside that makes a thing/person what it is, but what’s on the inside

programme.title: BABY POX
programme.desc: Everyone but Pai catches a pox that makes you act like a baby. He has to sail the Lord of the Wind by himself to get a mushroom for the cure, all while caring for the “babies.” Negu sends a huge Mutant Toad. Luckily, the toad catches the Baby Pox, too!

programme.title: Super Thomas
programme.desc: Fred gives Thomas the chance to feel like his idol, a comic book hero in a flying metal suit.

programme.title: You’ve Got Fe-Mail
programme.desc: Fred has written Nora dozens of “love emails” but never sent them—until Sir Percival accidentally hit the “Send” button. To prevent complete embarrassment, Fred hatches a caper to keep Nora away from her computer long enough for Brains to hack into it.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlie’s
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: Girlfriends Are A Girl’s Best Friend
programme.desc: Fred pushes Brains to try to get more girlfriends, and fit in more at school. Since other girls are all reading the “Ghostlight” books, Brains tries it, and gets hooked. Fred doesn’t get the books girly appeal, and worries that he’s going to lose Brains to her new girly romance-loving crowd.

programme.title: Shopping Mad
programme.desc: Its shopping time! Don and Colonel move the trolley up the aisles, little do they know that the three mice are peeping from between Don’s bag. Chaos unfolds in the mall!

programme.title: The Great Manfredi – The Bremen Town Musicians
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the famous tale by the Brothers Grimm, “THE BREMEN TOWN MUSICIANS“, having been called out by the MANAGER of that city’s theatre. Finally, the four musical animals are about to achieve their great dream: to perform in the Bremen Grand Theatre. But a mysterious, dangerous ghost seems to want to prevent this. The fairytale detective and her elf assistant unravel the mystery and confront the Great Manfredi, a cunning magician and illusionist.

programme.title: Take A Dance On Me
programme.desc: Pancake is terrible dancer, and when he joins the Zoonicorns in their dances to make flowers bloom, his issues could disrupt springtime. You dont have to be perfect at something to enjoy it.Feelings are as important as skills.

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: The Big Wave
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs set off a Smightynami wave that threatens to wash away Smightyland. Dude has to ride the big one and save the day.

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: King Zac
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: 52 The Zoonigames
programme.desc: Pancake is disheartened when Odessa beats him at a game, but after playing a series of games in the Zooniverse, he learns there’s something even more important than winning-or-losing. Playing games is not about winning or losing but bout having fun!

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: Hill Resort
programme.desc: Dunky, Keet and Cat arrive at a nearby hill station with GrandPA for a small holiday, just in time to realize that the local monkeys are not so friendly. A mad chase follows between the monkeys and the three of them .

programme.title: Double Role
programme.desc: ‘Ting tong’ .. Cat opens the door to sees a milk bowl at the door step. He slurps it up and ‘ZAP’ a Cat clone is formed.

programme.title: The Mystery
programme.desc: Kala’s martial arts trophy has vanished – and ‘detective’ Gummy volunteers his services to unravel the mystery and track down the culprit.

programme.title: I Lee
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: Amor a flote
programme.desc: Lorelei hereda un velero y contrata a Rob para navegarlo. El amor surge entre ellos a pesar del choque cultural.

programme.title: En nombre del amor
programme.desc: Nastya se enamora de Andréi, pero su amiga lo seduce y se casa con él. Tras un accidente, ella lo deja.

programme.title: ¡Bienvenidos a Canarias!
programme.desc: Valeria se entera de que su padre le dejó una granja en un pueblo con el nombre de Canarias.

programme.title: ¡Bienvenidos a Canarias!
programme.desc: Valeria se entera de que su padre le dejó una granja en un pueblo con el nombre de Canarias.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: American Thought Leaders
programme.desc: Featuring in-depth discussions with some of America's most influential thought leaders.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Mahal Niqash
programme.desc: A live talk show exploring controversial topics and issues.

programme.title: Sports News
programme.desc: Satisfying the needs of sports enthusiasts, Al Arabiya features specialized sports programs which aim to provide in-depth news and analysis on regional and international events.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Kachrewali love Story + Homework
programme.desc: “Kachrewali love story” as the name indicates is an unusual love story of a ragpicker man & a woman who besides their regular livelihood tries to lead life normally. But their real & happy world gets aggrieved when they gets destroyed with the bad & corrupt side of the society, thus making them start again from the beginning.

programme.title: Sehmat
programme.desc: The story centers around a young woman named Sehmat, who is eagerly anticipating her Muklawa, a traditional Punjabi custom that marks the first meeting between a newlywed couple. Sehmat has been in love with her husband Joginder since they were married as children, and she is excited to finally be reunited with him. However, on the day of their Muklawa, Joginder, who is an army man, is called away to fight in a war. The film then follows the emotional journey of Sehmat and Joginder as they navigate the difficulties of their separation and the choices they must make in the face of war. Joginder is torn between his love for Sehmat and his duty to his country, ultimately choosing to put his country first. This decision leaves Sehmat feeling both sad and proud, as she realizes the sacrifice that Joginder has made for his country. Overall, the film appears to explore themes of love, sacrifice, and patriotism, set against the backdrop of a tumultuous and uncertain time in history.

programme.title: The Crystal Brawl 1957
programme.desc: Bluto muscles out Popeye to take Olive to the fair. Popeye rushes ahead and poses as a fortune teller, luring Olive in. He shows Olive her future (actually, her past) in the crystal ball: first, a clip of a mountain climbing sequence that culminates in Bluto assaulting Olive. Then, a clip from another amusement park showing strongman Bluto stealing Olive away to a roller-coaster while Popeye rings a strength-testing bell repeatedly. Olive, having seen this, no longer wants anything to do with Bluto and walks out. Bluto exposes Popeye and chases Olive into a Tunnel of Love; Popeye follows and trashes Bluto.

programme.title: Assault and Flattery 1956
programme.desc: Bluto is accusing Popeye in judge Wimpy's courtroom. Bluto tells a sad tale of how Popeye attacked him without provocation, but Popeye tells his side, in detail (in other words, a large chunk of _Balmy Swami, A (1949)_)
